ISSUE.TITLE: Support gzipped document corpora TSV files
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Some of the document corpora are quite large when expressed as document-oriented TSV files (e.g. yso-finna-fi.tsv is 171MB), and thus difficult to store in GitHub which has a 100MB hard limit on file sizes. Annif should accept gzip-compressed document files as well.
